data.lyric:
[ti:Count The Hours]
[ar:BEAUZ/Nevve/Kastilione]
[al:Count The Hours]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Count The Hours - BEAUZ/Nevve/Kastilione
[00:03.16]Composed by：Bernie Yang/Johan Yang/Keeley Bumford
[00:06.33]I'm waiting through the shallows
[00:09.25]Just waiting for a sign
[00:12.51]It's dark under the clouds tonight clouds tonight
[00:18.91]You know I count the hours
[00:21.93]I'm waiting every second
[00:25.12]Till you realize
[00:26.89]Through the lows and the highs
[00:28.35]I'm the one you had to find
[00:31.54]Hey oooh
[00:34.69]Yeah oooh
[00:37.88]Will you realize
[00:39.66]I'm the one you had to find
[00:42.78]To find
[00:44.61]You know I count
[00:54.15]You know I count
[01:00.53]You know I play until play until
[01:06.88]You know I count
[01:13.51]I used to know just what I needed
[01:16.76]Figures in the light
[01:19.60]But now I'm struggling to survive
[01:24.69]The collide
[01:26.07]You know I count the hours
[01:29.07]I'm waiting every second
[01:32.26]Till you realize
[01:34.04]Through the lows and the highs
[01:35.56]I'm the one you had to find
[01:38.67]Hey oooh
[01:41.83]Yeah oooh
[01:44.97]Will you realize
[01:46.73]I'm the one you had to find
[01:49.87]To find
[01:51.60]You know I count
[02:01.22]You know I count
[02:07.63]You know I play until play until
[02:14.07]You know I count

[ar:BEAUZ/Nevve/Kastilione]
[al:Count The Hours]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.16]//
[00:06.33]我在浅滩处等待
[00:09.25]等待一个信号
[00:12.51]今晚 乌云之下 漆黑一片
[00:18.91]你知道 我在翘首期盼
[00:21.93]我一直在苦苦等待
[00:25.12]希望你明白
[00:26.89]无论起起落落 浮浮沉沉
[00:28.35]我始终是你要找的那个人
[00:31.54]//
[00:34.69]//
[00:37.88]你会不会明白
[00:39.66]我始终是你要找的那个人
[00:42.78]寻找
[00:44.61]你知道我在期盼着
[00:54.15]你知道我在期盼着
[01:00.53]你知道我不会放弃希望
[01:06.88]你知道我在期盼着
[01:13.51]曾经我知道我需要什么
[01:16.76]光芒下的身影
[01:19.60]但现在我却苟延残喘
[01:24.69]轰然崩塌
